title: Railroad Revenue Passenger-Miles, Commutation, Class I Railroads for United States
notes:
Data Beginning June 1955 Are Preliminary. Source: Interstate Commerce Commission, Revenue Traffic Statistics Of Class I Steam Railways.

This NBER data series m03012c appears on the NBER website in Chapter 3 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter03.html.
